title: Shooter Pleads NG, Sports Illustrated Swimsuit, Pastor Jamal Bryant, Wanda Sykes and more.
itunes:title: Shooter Pleads NG, Sports Illustrated Swimsuit, Pastor Jamal Bryant, Wanda Sykes and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride!  Happy Birthday Nephew Tommy!  The CLO gave us a reenactment.   Kourtney Kardashian and Travis Barker's kissing in now legal.  Congrats.  Pastor Jamal Bryant apologizes for words he said about Kevin Samuels.  The Buffalo shooter pleads not guilty.  MIA made it do what it do in The NBA ECF and Junior makes a prediction.  The fellas are asked rapid fire vanity questions.  Wanda Sykes told us how she really feels about Will Smith and Steve is in total agreement.  Was it Would You Rather or We Would today?  Today in Closing Remarks, Steve talks about dreams and visions as he wishes his nephew a Happy 55th Birthday.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
